alert.note: Alert for Okfuskee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:31PM CDT until September 08 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL OKFUSKEE COUNTY... At 231 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles south of Welty, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Okemah... Castle... Clearview... Welty... Pharoah... Mason... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 217 and 230. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
